name: TUMBLR // New No Resize Images | Beta version
description: Based on the incredible useful but no longer functional Tumblr Image Width: No Rescaling , this code will effectively prevent tumblr from resizing any image. Please see additional info for more details.
additional_info: log updated (new xkit avatars and such) :: 01.02.2020 released :: 04.12.2019 description this was originally an attempt to fix the tumblr image width no rescaling, however, after many tests, i realized that the code logic was no longer working in the new system that tumblr implemented. i decided to create from scratch a new code and this is the result. features the previous styles tried to work around tumblr system, and since it has changed, the style also stopped working. with this in mind, i wrote this style has a complete different logic and approach. this code will: >request the original image size >center them by changing the containers display mode from block to inline-flex >make sure bigger images wont go outside the boundaries >resize only icons and thumbnails images. (new xkit fixes included) notice: it will also resize embed videos. known issues: -some users rely on the very cropping and resize system to make their photosets look uniform, this style will show the original proportions and they will look mismatched. -gif makers use a trick to keep their original file size small and avoid their images from look too blurry by oversharpening their gifs. said gifs will look very sharpened and noisy. -credited gifs will also be resized to their original sizes. -images uploaded originally on texts post wont be on the center. -the centering messes with in dash blogs posts. +i might have missed some other icons and thumbnails that need resize too, but it will be fixed soon. the code is 80% done and functional. the 20% refer to these issues, which i will be trying to fix.
